bug.short_desc: Resizing a table column renders incorrect layout when horizontally scrolled to the right

long_desc.thetext:
Scenario: - make sure the table has more columns than fit the screen (a horizontal scroll bar is shown). - scroll all the way to the right - resize any of the columns visible in the table by moving the "splitter" between the columns headers - the "resize line" drawn by the qx.ui.table.pane.Scroller and the cells in the table are completely out of sync
This can be reproduced in the demo browser: http://demo.qooxdoo.org/current/demobrowser/index.html#table~Table_Resize_Columns.html
Attached also a screenshot of what it looks like.
Created attachment 1288 Preview of resize issue
What is the status of this issue?
Still as before. Not fixed and we don't know when we have time to fix it. Is there a chance that you might fix it yourself and contribute the result with a pull request?
